help-file.title: "WALL OF STONE"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <direction> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
When cast, "Wall of Stone" will block an exit to a room in the direction the caster has specified. No one will be able to enter or exit the room until the wall is dispelled, hit or its duration runs out.
